origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_historical_price', 'description': 'This function provides the historical price of a specific cryptocurrency on a given date.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency to analyze.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date for which the historical price is requested, in YYYY-MM-DD format.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price', 'description': 'The historical price of the specified cryptocurrency on the given date.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_historical_price, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Avalanche', 'date'是'2026-04-01'.
